串口指令：
1、激活：AA 3E 00 02 00 00 00 00 02 00 C0 4F 00 01 D7 2F 10 00 02 00 00 00 0D 29 02 03 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 12 FC F7 DD AA 16 00 02 00 00 00 00 03 00 3F DE 0B 00 00 01 00 00 E9 EB 1D CC AA 1B 00 02 00 00 00 00 04 00 65 7E 0B 01 00 32 00 00 01 5C D4 6C 8B 86 B5 7A 14 
2、5秒后：AA 13 00 02 00 00 00 00 05 00 03 2E 0B 03 00 30 3F 76 8B
3、返回挂架状态字（00 31 01 01 02 10 03 11 04 20 05 21 06 30 07 31）的指令：
AA 22 00 00 00 00 00 00 06 00 79 8F 00 FE 00 31 01 01 02 10 03 11 04 20 05 21 06 30 07 31 0E 93 9F F0
4、退出时：
AA 13 00 02 00 00 00 00 06 00 03 DE 0B 02 00 4B 02 E3 25
